pageTitle: Michael Kors Collection Maxi Sandals | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements FIT: True to European sizing. Size & Fit Heel: 3.5in / 90mm MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Leather: Calfskin. Rows of skinny straps form edgy cutouts on these Michael Kors sandals, and a smooth heel cap provides modern structure. Exposed back zip. Covered heel and leather sole. Description Sandals > Shoes > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The reigning authority in American sportswear, Michael Kors has been designing and merchandising fashion since 1981, when he launched his namesake line. Over the course of Kors's legendary career, his vision of chic, luxurious apparel and accessories has never strayed. Today, with flagship boutiques all over the world, countless awards won, and A-list celebrity status as a judge on the Emmy-nominated show 'Project Runway,' Michael Kors's influence on the industry cannot be overstated.
